original_text: We have heard that Moab's people are very proud. They think that they are better than everyone else. We know how much they boast.’ We have heard that Moab's people are very proud. They think that they are better than everyone else. We know how much they boast.’ We have heard that Moab's people are very proud.
korean_text: 우리가 모압의 교만을 들었나니 심한 교만 곧 그의 자고와 오만과 자랑과 그 마음의 거만이로다

sentences.original_text: We have heard that Moab's people are very proud
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 모압 사람들이 매우 교만하다는 것을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: They think that they are better than everyone else
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신이 다른 모든 사람보다 낫다고 생각합니다

sentences.original_text: We know how much they boast
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그들이 얼마나 자랑하는지 알고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: We have heard that Moab's people are very proud
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 모압 사람들이 매우 교만하다는 것을 들었습니다

sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그들이 얼마나 자랑하는지 알고 있습니다
